articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Conference of Chairpersons of Party Primary Committees
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Conference of Chairpersons of Party Primary Committees
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), had a photo session with the participants in the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the WPK. 
					 When respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un arrived at the venue of the photo session, the participants enthusiastically welcomed him, extending the greatest honor and deepest thanks to him.
					
					 He warmly waved back to the participants.
					
					 He warmly congratulated once again the participants in the conference reliably defending the major bases for strengthening the Party and building a powerful socialist country, before having a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the participants in the conference and all other chairpersons of the Party primary committees would regard the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as lifeline and creditably discharge their honorable mission and duty for the Party, the revolution, the country and the people as befitting political commissars of the major units defending the forefront of the drive to implement the ideas of the Party and uphold its policies.
					
					 Accompanying him were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi and Kim Yong Chol, members of the Political Bureau and vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Joint Art Performance of Moranbong Band and State Merited Chorus Given in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Joint Art Performance of Moranbong Band and State Merited Chorus Given in Presence of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A joint art performance was given with splendor by the Moranbong Band and the State Merited Chorus here on Wednesday in honor of the participants in the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 When Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un of the WPK, state and army appeared in the auditorium, all the performers and the participants of the conference broke into cheers of "hurrah!", extending the greatest honor and deepest thanks to him.
					
					 He waved back to the participants in the conference.
					
					 The artistes of the Moranbong Band and the Merited State Chorus depicted the revolutionary songs, march songs of the Mallima era, in a new and peculiar way.
					
					 The performance began with orchestral music and male chorus "Forever with the Leader and the Party". Put on the stage were instrumental music and series of songs "You Are Mother", female chorus "Are We Living in Those Days?" kayagum solo "Song of Big Fish Haul" and male solo and female panchang "We Sing of the Party".
					
					 The performers highly praised with artistic canvas the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers powerfully demonstrating the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to win the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, remaining loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un congratulated the performers on their successful representation and expressed expectation and belief that the participants in the conference would discharge their mission and duty as the frontline political officials.
					
					 Among the audience were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau; Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi and Kim Yong Chol, members of the Political Bureau and vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: 4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Held
articles.content:
4th Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Held
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The 4th meeting of activists in fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place here on Thursday.
					 Present at the meeting were KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Army General Ri Yong Gil, minister of the People's Armed Forces, commanding officers of the KPA, officials and innovators in fisheries under the KPA.
					
					 Hwang Pyong So said in a report that this year has been the days of merits when legendary tales about the fishing were created.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un has energetically led the People's Army to make the flames of fishing revolution more furiously rage in the van of the all-out onward campaign for the final victory.
					
					 Officials and fishermen in fisheries under the People's Army made big fish hauls by waging an active fishing campaign.
					
					 It is the most brilliant review of the fishing campaign this year that nothing would be impossible to achieve for the officials and fishermen who uphold the campaign order issued by the Party with absolute belief that its determination means science and practice and if they do as instructed by it, the miracle of creating the history of big fish haul will be wrought.
					
					 The reporter called for a more dynamic fishing campaign to make another fish hauls under the guidance of Kim Jong Un next year.
					
					 Speakers referred to the successes, experience and lessons drawn from consolidating the material and technical foundation for fishing and fishery stations in the past period and preparing fishermen to be all-round ones.
					
					 They expressed their resolve to make big fish hauls in the new year, too.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the standings of units of various levels in fisheries under the People's Army in the socialist fishing campaign this year were decided and silk banner were awarded to the excellent units.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., UAWK
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., UAWK
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) gave its performance at the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang City on Thursday to celebrate the 5th anniversary of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The performance began with choruses "Glory to General Kim Jong Un" and "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colours of the Supreme Commander".
					
					 Its numbers included male solo "Our Arms" and comic story "Look at Us".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un has performed by glorifying the DPRK as a politico-ideological and military power.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., UAWK, officials concerned and officials of the union and agricultural workers.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the missions of WHO, WFP and FAO here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Thursday on the occasion of the New Year Juche 106 (2017).
					 They paid homage to the great leaders after presenting floral baskets before their statues.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here on Thursday visited the Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the school and made bow to them.
					
					 Being told that the children of revolutionary martyrs are growing to become the backbone of the Songun revolution under the loving care of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, the guests went round an all-purpose stadium and other parts of the school.
					
					 They conducted firing live bullets at the shooting gallery of it.

articles.title: Dignity of Youth Power Displayed in 2016
articles.content:
Dignity of Youth Power Displayed in 2016
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Juche 105 (2016) is a proud year, in which the DPRK has demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's youth power all over the world.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un opened up a golden age of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist youth movement by successfully carrying forward the idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on  attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 He saw to it that the 70th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was celebrated with splendor and a congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was sent.
					
					 He visited the newly-built Youth Movement Museum on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the youth league and stressed the need to hold fast to the idea of attaching importance to the youth as invariable strategic line, having the same noble outlook on the future and the rising generation as the great leaders did.
					
					 The 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was held in the presence of Kim Jong Un. It was a significant grand gathering of the youth which provided a new milestone in making a victorious advance of the Juche-oriented youth movement and strengthening the youth league.
					
					 At the congress the youth league with five-million-strong youth ranks was renamed the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.
					
					 Cherishing the trust of the Workers' Party of Korea that has put forward them as masters of the youth power, the young Korean people demonstrated spirit and valor of the youth at the worksites of the 70-day campaign and the 200-day campaign.
					
					 Members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade built another power station in a less than half a year, thus creating the spirit of the Paektusan hero youth and fully displaying the might of the youth power.
					
					 A number of young people volunteered the shock brigades to contribute to finishing the construction of more than a hundred projects.
					
					 At least 5 900 young people carried out their three-year and more and two-year national economic plans and more than 80 000 young people overfulfilled their yearly national economic plans.
					
					 Through a mass technological innovation movement, young scientists played the core and leading role in occupying the fortress of ultramodern technology, including space and nuclear technologies, and in settling the scientific and technological issues arising in hastening the building of a socialist power and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 And girl footballers won the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup and the 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.
					
					 The number of the young front-rankers in noble traits is increasing. Many young people were awarded the titles of the Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and the Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and many units the titles of the Young Vanguard Model Primary Committee and the Young Vanguard Model Primary Organization.
					
					 Upon receiving the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army in February this year, more than one million young people volunteered to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army across the country with the faith and will to devotedly defend the Party and the leader and settle accounts with hostile forces.
					
					 All the facts prove that the future of the DPRK is bright as there is a huge army of young people dashing ahead like the wind along the orbit of the Korean revolution indicated by the great Party.

articles.title: Quality Medals Awarded to Best Products in DPRK
articles.content:
Quality Medals Awarded to Best Products in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Six best products produced in 2016 were awarded the December 15 quality medals.
					 Among them are "general engine lubricant SJ/CH 40" produced by the Chonji Lubricant Factory, a tile by the Chollima Tile Factory and a bath towel and face towel by the Sariwon Taesong Towel Factory.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday.

articles.title: Monument to Feats of Heroic Youth Unveiled
articles.content:
Monument to Feats of Heroic Youth Unveiled
Paekam, December 29 (KCNA) -- A monument to the feats performed by heroic youth was successfully erected at the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station symbolic of the youth power.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un personally initiated the erection of the monument, chose its site and examined its layout, leading the project for truthfully representing their heroic struggle.
					
					 He saw to it that the medal of DPRK Hero and his autograph "Monument to Feats of Heroic Youth" were inscribed on its front side. He meticulously guided officials to erect it on the highest level, learned about its project and personally solved all problems arising in it.
					
					 True to his noble intention, members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade and officials and workers of the unit concerned successfully erected the monument through their devoted struggle.
					
					 Thanks to the erection of the monument another education center has been provided for giving eternal luster to the feats of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un who trained the Korean young people into heroes of the times and giants of creation and for showing how the shock brigade members created the new spirit of the times.
					
					 Its unveiling ceremony took place on Thursday.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK issued a stamp (individual) to mark the fifth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the post as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Depicted on the stamp are Mt. Paektu and the flying colors of the Supreme Commander and a rifle.

articles.title: DPRK Concentrates Efforts on Establishing C1 Chemical Industry
articles.content:
DPRK Concentrates Efforts on Establishing C1 Chemical Industry
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has concentrated its efforts on establishing the C1 chemical industry based on coal gasification, one of the goals of the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 Kim Hwa Sik, department director of the Ministry of Chemical Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 Successes were made in establishing the C1 chemical industry this year.
					
					 Design groups and construction commands were organized in the Ministry and its affiliated units.
					
					 Establishing the C1 chemical industry is aimed to put the chemical industry of the country onto a higher level.
					
					 The C1 chemical industry is of weighty significance in putting the nation's chemical industry on a Juche basis.
					
					 The prospect of the C1 chemical industry based on coal gasification is optimistic.
					
					 The Hungnam Fertilizer Complex has already established the methanol production process based on coal gasification.

articles.title: Machon Pass Tunnel Completed
articles.content:
Machon Pass Tunnel Completed
Kim Chaek, December 29 (KCNA) -- Machon Pass Tunnel was completed to link South Hamgyong Province with North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK.
					 The completion of the tunnel makes it possible to markedly reduce the travel time and thus further facilitate the transport of freight.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on the spot on Thursday.

articles.title: Local Industry Refurbished in DPRK
articles.content:
Local Industry Refurbished in DPRK
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Great progress has been made in the work for putting the local industry on a modern basis in the DPRK this year.
					 The foodstuff producers in Hoechang County, South Phyongan Province introduced the integrated production system into the major production processes for over 40 days, while establishing the production process for carbonated water.
					
					 Paper producers have installed the new type multi-functional paper machine to mass-produce various kinds of notebooks and toilet tissues.
					
					 Factories in the province have pushed ahead with the work for remodeling the production processes.
					
					 The Songdowon General Foodstuff Factory in Kangwon Province modernized the sugar and soya milk production processes in the period of 200-day campaign.
					
					 Similar successes have been made in provinces, cities and countries, including Sakju and Tongchang Counties of North Phyongan Province, Paechon County of South Hwanghae Province and Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province.

articles.title: KCNA Releases Detailed Report on DPRK's Victory in Ending Era of Sanctions and Pressure over Nuclear Issue
articles.content:
KCNA Releases Detailed Report on DPRK's Victory in Ending Era of Sanctions and Pressure over Nuclear Issue
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency on Dec. 28 released a detailed report on the situation of the Korean peninsula in 2016.
					 The detailed report reads in part:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to make patient efforts for peace of the Korean peninsula and stability of the region.
					
					 Reviewing the situation in 2015 when the touch-and-go situation of war or peace was created, the DPRK proposed again to conclude a peace treaty with the U.S., signatory of the Armistice Agreement, to remove the root cause of war as early as possible and achieve durable peace on the Korean peninsula in which they are technically at war.
					
					 Early in January this year the DPRK reaffirmed its principled stand to play the responsible role to protect peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world and strongly demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop the dangerous war exercises for aggression and military provocations escalating the tension on the peninsula. 
					
					 However, the U.S. has still pursued hostile policy toward the DPRK and resorted to nuclear blackmail and threat to it, driving the situation of the Korean peninsula and the region into tensions and instability all the year round.
					
					 At the end of the last year the U.S. announced "4D operation plan" for preemptive attack on the nukes and missiles of the DPRK and included it in the new war scenario OPLAN 5015 and hastily conducted the test of a new nuclear bomb B61-12 specially developed for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. moves to ignite a war reached the worst phase with the largest-ever Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills as a momentum, the drills staged from August 22 to September 2.
					
					 The U.S. unprecedented provocations and nuclear blackmail forced the DPRK to bolster its war deterrence and take more offensive and stronger measures one after another.
					
					 The DPRK demonstrated non-stop the power of highly miniaturized, precision, diversified nuclear strike means and military hardware and thus drove south Korea and its surrounding regions where the aggressor troops were introduced, and even the U.S. mainland into veritable hell of appalling confusion and the worst uneasiness and fear.
					
					 The DPRK's new nuclear warhead explosion test was a great event which heralded the passing of the final gate for rounding off its national nuclear force and a historical deed which guaranteed the eternal prosperity and security of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces impeccably have access to H-bomb for tipping ballistic rockets, the ultra-modern striking means capable of carrying various kinds of nuclear warheads to all theatres of operation including the ground, sky, sea and underwater without limitation so as to wipe out invaders and provocateurs anytime and at any place.
					
					 A nuclear weapons state in the East resolutely announces.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S. threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 Now the DPRK poses the greatest threat and horror to the U.S.
					
					 The heroic Korean people shattered to smithereens the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness" and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for them in the past 1950s, and they are driving the U.S. into the abyss of the final ruin in the new century of Juche.
					
					 The DPRK is demonstrating its might as a politico-ideological power and nuclear power and bringing the people's happiness under the present international situation in which sovereignty of countries and nations is being violated and they are suffering bloody disasters owing to the imperialists' aggression and interference. This stirring reality goes to prove once again the validity and vitality of the line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK will make as ever a dynamic struggle for fundamentally remove the danger of a nuclear war being imposed by the U.S. in reliance on strong defence capacity with the nuclear deterrence as a pivot and for defending peace in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The DPRK with the nuclear treasured sword of justice has already declared the ruin of the era of sanctions and pressure over the nuclear issue.

articles.title: DPRK Remains Unfazed in Any Storm and Stress: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Remains Unfazed in Any Storm and Stress: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Extreme terrorist organizations and heavily armed criminals in many parts of the world recklessly attack and kill innocent people in public places including universities, shops, theaters and markets, rendering the international situation all the more complicated, observes Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 As proven by the reality, it is hard to find countries in peace worldwide.
					
					 However, the DPRK is pushing forward the building of a powerful socialist country in a peaceful environment, remaining unfazed in any storm and stress.
					
					 Not a few foreigners recognize this fact after witnessing the reality of the DPRK for themselves.
					
					 Whoever has been to the DPRK has the common understanding that it is very stable politically.
					
					 Many foreigners are stunned to see the reality of the DPRK as they are fed up with the false propaganda about it conducted by Western media and feel resentful at its hypocrisy.
					
					 The DPRK needs to bolster up its military muscle and nuclear capability to protect the security and happiness of its people from the hostile forces' aggression and nuclear threat. 
					
					 The country will as ever stand firm.

articles.title: Authorities' Abuse of Power Laid bare in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Abuse of Power Laid bare in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The People's Emergency Action for Resignation of the Park Geun Hye Regime held a press conference outside the office of special prosecution on December 26, at which it filed suits with the prosecution against puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An and former chief secretary of civil administration U Pyong U for abuse of power, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers at the conference said that Hwang and U are chiefly to blame for abusing "state power" as they did not prevent Park Geun Hye from monopolizing "state administration" after offering Choe Sun Sil all power and even conspired with them.
					
					 They said that they zealously disturbed the investigation into the interference in the "presidential" election by the Intelligence Service and the ferry Sewol disaster, adding that all these evil acts were tantamount to abuse of power.
					
					 They urged the special prosecution to strictly investigate and punish the suspects.

articles.title: Resignation of Puppet Defense Minister Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Puppet Defense Minister Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 176th peace and disarmament rally outside the building of the puppet defense ministry on Dec. 27, at which it denounced the military for going reckless in the sycophantic and treacherous acts.
					 The organization slammed the defense minister for concluding an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan which may make south Korea subject to it.
					
					 It demanded the defense minister cancel the plan for deployment of THAAD and retract the above-said agreement and step down at once.

articles.title: S. Koreans Oppose Ban Ki-moon's Running for "Presidency"
articles.content:
S. Koreans Oppose Ban Ki-moon's Running for "Presidency"
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People in an editorial opposed UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon's running for "presidency" on Dec. 27.
					 The editorial noted that Ban recently declared his attitude to run for "presidency" but there is a growing suspicion that he took hundreds of thousands of US dollars from a big business.
					
					 If he runs for "presidency", it will cause political distrust and disgust for him, it stressed.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally of Koreans in Japan Staged to Urge Ouster of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally of Koreans in Japan Staged to Urge Ouster of Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally of Koreans in Japan was held in Sinjuku, Tokyo, on Dec. 24 under the sponsorship of the headquarters for the promotion of signature campaign of overseas Koreans for resignation of Park Geun Hye.
					 Speakers said corruption committed by Park of south Korea in collusion with Choe Sun Sil can never be tolerated, urging Park to resign at once.
					
					 Noting that candlelight rally demanding the ouster of Park is sweeping across south Korea, they called on overseas Koreans to actively join in the struggle.
					
					 Then, the participants in the rally launched a candlelight march, drawing attention of tens of thousands of citizens.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded in Switzerland
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Dec. 13 to celebrate the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il's assumption served as a historic landmark in accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution and that the DPRK turned into a satellite-manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear weapons state under his guidance.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the gifted strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander, had strengthened the KPA into invincible revolutionary ranks that can defeat any formidable enemy at a single blow.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists seeking a second Korean war dared not invade the DPRK.
					
					 Peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world was reliably ensured.
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il led the People's Army to make a breakthrough in every sector of socialist construction.
					
					 Thanks to him, socialism of the DPRK was firmly defended and the imperialists and reactionaries' moves against socialism came to failure.
					
					 We extend eternal glory to him, brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries gave special write-ups to the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il between Dec. 1 and 16.
					 The Tanzanian newspaper Uhuru allotted one whole page to an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal leader of the Korean people" illustrated with a portrait of his smiling image.
					
					 The paper noted that though Kim Jong Il passed away, he is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people, adding he had made a ceaseless journey of devotion for the country and people in his lifetime.
					
					 The Indian newspaper Indian and World Event allotted two whole pages to an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il will be alive forever" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article said that the world lost the most prominent great man with sudden demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and pioneer of the cause of independence, it said, adding:
					
					 He consistently set independence, peace and friendship as the fundamental idea of the DPRK's external activities and paid deep attention to building an independent, new world.
					
					 He will always live in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressives.
					
					 The Iranian news Ilna introduced in detail the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Guinean newspaper Horoya allotted one whole page to an article titled "Whole life for the people" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp to praise his whole life for the country and people.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Guinean Domestic, International and seven National Languages Broadcasting Services aired the exploits of Kim Jong Il who provided the eternal foundation for the country's prosperity and the Guinean Renaissance Broadcasting Service conveyed detailed data about the ardent admiration of the people for Kimjongilia.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Various Countries
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Various Countries
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in India, Cambodia and Sri Lanka between Dec. 5 and 17 to commemorate the fifth anniversary of his demise.
					 On display in the venues of events were photos showing the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the seminars were personages and popular masses of those countries.
					
					 Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, said Kim Jong Il performed great feats for the world history of politics, adding that the most important one of his exploits is the Songun leadership feat.
					
					 B. C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, said Kim Jong Il's life was a brilliant life devoted to the victory of the Korean revolution and happiness of the people as well as to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The editor-in-chief of the Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon said Kim Jong Il was a great statesman as he led the revolution and construction with the Juche idea as the guiding idea of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 W. A. Duminduwardane, chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies, praised Kim Jong Il as the great master of the independent politics who made noteworthy contributions to the world political history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Introduced in Russia
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- "On Improving the Role of the UAWK in Accomplishing the Juche-Oriented Socialist Cause", a letter sent by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to those attending the 8th Congress of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK), was posted by Russia's internet paper Edinaya Korea and online magazine on December 12.
					 The work, published on Dec. 6, Juche 105 (2016), clarifies that the UAWK is a mass-based political organization of the Korean socialist agricultural workers, founded and developed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, and a reliable transmission belt and peripheral organization of the Party.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for the union.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en la Primera Conferencia de Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con participantes en la Primera Conferencia de Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio junto con los participantes en la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido.
					Cuando el se presento en el lugar de filmacion, los participantes le acogieron con hospitalidad rindiendole el maximo honor y expresandole el mas cordial agradecimiento.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente respondio con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones de los reunidos.
					
					Volvio a felicitar calidamente a los participantes y se retrato con ellos que defienden con firmeza las posiciones principales para el fortalecimiento y desarrollo del Partido y para la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Kim Jong Un expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que tomando como cuestion vital los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los participantes y los presidentes de comite de base de todo el Partido cumpliran perfectamente su mision y deber honrosos asumidos ante el Partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo como comisarios politicos de las unidades principales de la lucha por materializar la idea del Partido y defender sus politicas.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi y Kim Yong Chol, miembros del BP y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia con participantes en conferencia la funcion conjunta de Banda Moranbong y Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia con participantes en conferencia la funcion conjunta de Banda Moranbong y Coro Estatal Benemerito
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 28 en esta capital la funcion artistica conjunta de la Banda Moranbong y el Coro Estatal Benemerito para los participantes en la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido.
					Cuando Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y el Ejercito, salio al palco, todos los artistas y los espectadores le dirigieron la maxima gloria y el saludo mas cordial gritando las aclamaciones de "!Vivas!".
					
					El Maximo Dirigente respondio a los saludos de los participantes en la conferencia.
					
					Los artistas de dichos conjuntos artisticos pusieron en la escena las canciones revolucionarias de la epoca de Mallima, descritas de modo nuevo y singular.
					
					En la escena iniciada con la musica orquestal y el coro masculino "Largo camino bajo el mando del Presidente y siguiendo al Partido" se presentaron la musica instrumental y las canciones en serie "Tu eres mi madre", el solo masculino "Partido es mi mejor patron", el coro femenino "?Vivimos como en aquel tiempo?", el solo de Kayagum "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar" y "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol", el solo masculino y el pangchang femenino "Cantamos al partido", y etc.
					
					Los artistas elogiaron en tono patetico con emociones artisticas las hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se pusieron tambien en la escena el solo femenino "Contamos con el gran partido", el solo femenino y el pangchang "Por tener al partido", la cancion y baile "Somos jinetes de Mallima" y el coro femenino "Socialismo en avance".
					
					Tambien, se pueden ver las piezas que demostraron vigorosamente la conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de lograr la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo fielmente la direccion del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					La funcion gano la efusiva ovacion de la audiencia.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente felicito el exito de los ejecutantes logrado en la funcion y manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los participantes en la conferencia cumpliran con su mision y deber como funcionarios politicos en terreno.
					
					Lo vieron tambien el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon, O Su Yong, Kwak Pom Gi y Kim Yong Chol, miembros del BP y vicepresidentes del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Efectuada IV reunion de activistas de rama pesquera del EPC
articles.content:
Efectuada IV reunion de activistas de rama pesquera del EPC
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en esta capital la IV reunion de activistas de la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, y otros comandantes del EPC y los funcionarios y los innovadores laborales de la rama.
					
					Hwang Pyong So subrayo en el informe de la ocasion que un ano transcurrido fue los dias en que se ha creado el mito de pesca.
					
					Menciono que el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un dirigio dinamicamente al EPC a registrar innovaciones mas grandes en la pesqueria poniendose al frente de la ofensiva general por la victoria final.
					
					Continuo que los funcionarios y pescadores de la rama capturaron abundantes peces trabajando con la decision de vida o muerte.
					
					No hay nada imposible para ellos quienes cumplen a riesgo de la vida las ordenes del PTC con la conviccion absoluta de que la decision de esta organizacion es ciencia y hecho y pueden crear la historia del mar de oro si trabajan siguiendo las instrucciones del Partido, esto es el balance valioso de la campana de pesca de este ano, apunto.
					
					El informante exhorto a intensificar la pesca en el ano proximo para repetir abundantes capturas bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Los oradores enumeraron los exitos, experiencias y lecciones obtenidos anteriormente en la pesca, la consolidacion de la base material y tecnica de empresas pesqueras y la formacion de tripulantes como pescadores omnipotentes.
					
					Y expresaron la decision de hacer repercutir tambien en el Ano Nuevo las sirenas de vapor anunciadoras de carga repleta de pescados.
					
					En la ocasion fue publicado el ranking de la emulacion socialista entre las unidades de todos los niveles de la rama pesquera del EPC y fueron otorgadas a las sobresalientes las banderas de triunfo.

articles.title: Otorgada Medalla de Calidad 15 de Diciembre a mejores productos de 2016
articles.content:
Otorgada Medalla de Calidad 15 de Diciembre a mejores productos de 2016
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Fue otorgada la Medalla de Calidad 15 de Diciembre a los mejores productos de este ano.
					Recibieron la condecoracion el "lubricante SJ/CH 40" de la Fabrica de Lubricante Chonji, los azulejos de la Fabrica de Azulejos Chollima, las toallas de bano y aseo de la Fabrica de Toalla Taesong de Sariwon y otros 3 productos.
					
					El acto de otorgamiento de la medalla tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo.

articles.title: Marcha bien en RPDC la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1
articles.content:
Marcha bien en RPDC la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La RPDC se concentra las fuerzas en la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1 mediante la gasificacion de carbon, una de las metas de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional.
					En exclusiva con la ACNC, Kim Hwa Sik, director del Ministerio de Industria Quimica, dijo que este ano fueron organizadas las fuerzas de diseno y la comandancia de la construccion en el ministerio y tambien en las unidades adscritas, registrando asi notables exitos en la fundacion de la industria quimica de C1, y prosiguio:
					
					La fundacion de la industria quimica de C1 es una labor para poner en la etapa mas alta la industria quimica del pais. 
					
					La industria quimica de C1 posibilita producir gran cantidad de articulos quimicos basicos con el metanol hecho con el carbon, que se abunda en el pais, en vez de las materias primas importadas, asi que tiene gran importancia en el desarrollo de la industria quimica del pais con los recursos nacionales.
					
					En nuestro pais es muy optima la perspectiva de la industria quimica de C1 mediante la gasificacion de carbon.
					
					En el Complejo de Fertilizantes de Hungnam se establecio ya el proceso de produccion de metanol segun la gasificacion de carbon.
					
					Si se acondicionara tambien en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung la base de produccion de metanol, se impulsara vigorosamente en las bases de industria quimica la produccion de los productos quimicos basicos tales como orlon y la fibra PP.
